returns._daiCredits: The amount of DAI credits on the Keep3r Job

params._invoiceNonce: The number ID of the deleted invoice

params._claimableDai: The equivalent amount of DAI to be charged for the gas amount
params._description: A text description to explain the nature of the invoice
params._gasCostETH: The amount of gas invoiced in ETH

params._amount: The amont of the token that will be transferred
params._to: The address that will receive the idle funds
params._token: The token that will be transferred

params._job: The address of the Job contract
params._keep3r: The address of Keep3r where the job is registered

params._keeper: The address allowed to upkeep the claim function

params._pendingGovernor: The address being proposed as the new governance

params._vestId: The numeric ID of the vest

daiToClaim.return: _dai The amount of DAI currently in debt to the contract

returns._0: _dai The amount of DAI currently in debt to the contract

job.return: _job The address of the Job contract

returns._0: _job The address of the Job contract

keep3r.return: _keep3r The address of Keep3r where the job is registered

returns._0: _keep3r The address of Keep3r where the job is registered

keeper.return: _keeper The address allowed to upkeep the claim function

returns._0: _keeper The address allowed to upkeep the claim function

IncorrectVestId().notice: Throws when the provided vest ID doesn't have contract as beneficiary

InvoiceClaimed().notice: Throws when the invoice to be deleted has already been claimed

MinBuffer().notice: Throws when the vested DAI is less than MinBuffer

OnlyGovernor().notice: Throws if the caller of the function is not Governance

OnlyKeeper().notice: Throws when an unallowed address tries to trigger upkeep

OnlyMaker().notice: Throws when an unallowed address tries to trigger Maker methods

OnlyPendingGovernor().notice: Throws if the caller of the function is not pendingGovernance

ZeroAddress().notice: Throws if a variable is assigned to the zero address

BufferSet(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when Maker sets new buffer thresholds

ClaimedDai(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when the DAI vest mechanism is executed

DeletedInvoice(uint256).notice: Emitted when Governor removes an incorrect invoice

InvoicedGas(uint256,uint256,uint256,stri.notice: Emitted when Governor adds an invoice to be charged

Keep3rJobSet(address,address).notice: Emitted when Governor changes the Keep3r and Job addresses

KeeperSet(address).notice: Emitted when Governor changes the Keeper address

PendingGovernorAccepted(address).notice: Emitted when pendingGovernance accepts to be governance

PendingGovernorSet(address,address).notice: Emitted when a new governance is proposed

VestSet(uint256,uint48,uint48,uint48,uin.notice: Emitted when Maker sets a new vest

acceptPendingGovernor().notice: Changes the governance from the current governance to the previously proposed address

claimDai().notice: Allows Governor to trigger DAI vest

claimDaiUpkeep().notice: Allows Keeper to trigger DAI vest

daiToClaim().notice: Sum of invoiced DAI amount minus already claimed DAI

deleteInvoice(uint256).notice: Allows Governor to remove an unclaimed invoice

invoiceAmount(uint256).notice: Maps the invoice ID to the invoiced DAI amount

maxBuffer().notice: The maximum amount of DAI to be vested at a time

minBuffer().notice: The minimum amount of DAI to be vested

sendDust(address,uint256,address).notice: Allows an authorized user to transfer the tokens or eth that may have been left in a contract

setBuffer(uint256,uint256).notice: Allows Maker to set the buffer thresholds

setKeep3rJob(address,address).notice: Allows Governor to set new Keep3rJob

setKeeper(address).notice: Allows Governor to set new Keeeper

setPendingGovernor(address).notice: Proposes a new address to be governance

setVestId(uint256).notice: Allows Governor to set the vest ID
